Structure of a Contract

# 

<span key="eca78e7487cf4d59ba15010a3af07ce1"><span offset-key="eca78e7487cf4d59ba15010a3af07ce1:0">Structure of a Contract</span></span>

<span key="e02d0a67b32544869bb3c84845ffc826"><span offset-key="e02d0a67b32544869bb3c84845ffc826:0">Contracts in Solidity are similar to classes in object-oriented languages. Each contract can contain declarations of </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-state-variables" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="653dd0ab542d4aa182688c298436b196" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="7b9f052dbd7540b9bb911b5f5e66668b"><span data-offset-key="7b9f052dbd7540b9bb911b5f5e66668b:0">State Variables</span></span></span></a><span key="4e99b2cb1aa2491a836cec5d466c712e"><span offset-key="4e99b2cb1aa2491a836cec5d466c712e:0">, </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-functions" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f950db7166964f53947c44adc9dce35b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="66cf527649ae40688edfac96a4ce9844"><span data-offset-key="66cf527649ae40688edfac96a4ce9844:0">Functions</span></span></span></a><span key="2691f2f9e4d5467cab27e1d8e6c5f00d"><span offset-key="2691f2f9e4d5467cab27e1d8e6c5f00d:0">, </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-function-modifiers" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="98fbf5760e624f6dab801844a3d911cc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="1583959e1f3a4d64af2fef7a6ec580be"><span data-offset-key="1583959e1f3a4d64af2fef7a6ec580be:0">Function Modifiers</span></span></span></a><span key="718d76a83cac4befaa6919e427bd7b4d"><span offset-key="718d76a83cac4befaa6919e427bd7b4d:0">, </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-events" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="190f5a6d055c4542bfb940d4f1aecfcf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="faa7aa7c3dc14f238d9a9eca8a3635ce"><span data-offset-key="faa7aa7c3dc14f238d9a9eca8a3635ce:0">Events</span></span></span></a><span key="2c1354605daf4945ba6c503cf209fc37"><span offset-key="2c1354605daf4945ba6c503cf209fc37:0">, </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-errors" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0c43726a412949ff8f3f9378ad01e4d5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="0831bfbd8ea4476594327417c167a8dd"><span data-offset-key="0831bfbd8ea4476594327417c167a8dd:0">Errors</span></span></span></a><span key="58d8a123e5d04984ad22bb89622eacc3"><span offset-key="58d8a123e5d04984ad22bb89622eacc3:0">, </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-struct-types" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="92cfe468f477433dad93b1600aaca2be" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="c6f694d3221c499383731e400d499f49"><span data-offset-key="c6f694d3221c499383731e400d499f49:0">Struct Types</span></span></span></a><span key="f859342e973345b5bf33621e6b258397"><span offset-key="f859342e973345b5bf33621e6b258397:0"> and </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/structure-of-a-contract.html#structure-enum-types" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5bbdb583089341a69e5388681e3be6f8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="bc3e3a2c6a554da682376e656b43dab1"><span data-offset-key="bc3e3a2c6a554da682376e656b43dab1:0">Enum Types</span></span></span></a><span key="284a285b0be64e40ae5c53d7bc810fe4"><span offset-key="284a285b0be64e40ae5c53d7bc810fe4:0">. Furthermore, contracts can inherit from other contracts.</span></span>

<span key="77b363192c0e41d699b661e56b0660e0"><span offset-key="77b363192c0e41d699b661e56b0660e0:0">There are also special kinds of contracts called </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#libraries" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9a98bdad980f4c24b74eb0c671e2dbb0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="65c8d1cfaecb4425af1492ce6022922c"><span data-offset-key="65c8d1cfaecb4425af1492ce6022922c:0">libraries</span></span></span></a><span key="bfb8b3221d2b44da9295074bcca16b01"><span offset-key="bfb8b3221d2b44da9295074bcca16b01:0"> and </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#interfaces" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2cd6b426aefc4df38f192164fab855cb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="cdae6f6ea2794787ba2b7fd6e8f502db"><span data-offset-key="cdae6f6ea2794787ba2b7fd6e8f502db:0">interfaces</span></span></span></a><span key="cb95e37474b9463eb9f79c891837fb7b"><span offset-key="cb95e37474b9463eb9f79c891837fb7b:0">.</span></span>

<span key="51f1e4baa20a4a3da1a128b32d3442a1"><span offset-key="51f1e4baa20a4a3da1a128b32d3442a1:0">The section about </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#contracts" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="742abbd7f51c4c81a42a140e9eae9624" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="936fabb52d2c42b1a3e61efc8a044d4f"><span data-offset-key="936fabb52d2c42b1a3e61efc8a044d4f:0">contracts</span></span></span></a><span key="d14bc45e6d1a455fbbba5126478e9f31"><span offset-key="d14bc45e6d1a455fbbba5126478e9f31:0"> contains more details than this section, which serves to provide a quick overview.</span></span>

## 

<span key="d2a8d21e08f0486d846e56403f033303"><span offset-key="d2a8d21e08f0486d846e56403f033303:0">State Variables</span></span>

<span key="8f34e04215294045a84ef60702f60922"><span offset-key="8f34e04215294045a84ef60702f60922:0">State variables are variables whose values are permanently stored in contract storage.</span></span>

1

<span key="27b939e32197425d8e40772e83e41ea7"><span offset-key="27b939e32197425d8e40772e83e41ea7:0">// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0</span></span>

2

<span key="d7bdeb93e4d34a37a4b39069f6d95d94"><span offset-key="d7bdeb93e4d34a37a4b39069f6d95d94:0">pragma solidity &gt;=0.4.0 &lt;0.9.0;</span></span>

3

<span key="c3808c3afbd24a1d9179aebaa64fcfbc"><span offset-key="c3808c3afbd24a1d9179aebaa64fcfbc:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

4

<span key="29b49b589fef4440811d58b3fdf6c3fd"><span offset-key="29b49b589fef4440811d58b3fdf6c3fd:0">contract SimpleStorage {</span></span>

5

<span key="ed3016d754fb4f7194767bf5a768c5cc"><span offset-key="ed3016d754fb4f7194767bf5a768c5cc:0"> uint storedData; // State variable</span></span>

6

<span key="67a74388f9b942a6b53ea4ea6bf62c5d"><span offset-key="67a74388f9b942a6b53ea4ea6bf62c5d:0"> // ...</span></span>

7

<span key="741c63a16305415aa5c4c057c4ac0365"><span offset-key="741c63a16305415aa5c4c057c4ac0365:0">}</span></span>

Copied!

<span key="939e6acc071b46fe82a65b6521010a0b"><span offset-key="939e6acc071b46fe82a65b6521010a0b:0">See the </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/types.html#types" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9b54bb3d8f5146b3a77b6beb981ead68" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="9c92ce373996492a820209660090225a"><span data-offset-key="9c92ce373996492a820209660090225a:0">Types</span></span></span></a><span key="d2de7fa55a4246e3857f92b3f21671a2"><span offset-key="d2de7fa55a4246e3857f92b3f21671a2:0"> section for valid state variable types and </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#visibility-and-getters" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0c7188786d5d44c48da53d8b1444f2e3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="2a14bf9e8971473daf79f611d7d3e28d"><span data-offset-key="2a14bf9e8971473daf79f611d7d3e28d:0">Visibility and Getters</span></span></span></a><span key="753fcef7539a4001abfc7ebe10031f20"><span offset-key="753fcef7539a4001abfc7ebe10031f20:0"> for possible choices for visibility.</span></span>

## 

<span key="2d5313ed22e444cf9d1fbe4ca35d5839"><span offset-key="2d5313ed22e444cf9d1fbe4ca35d5839:0">Functions</span></span>

<span key="86746c75619540a4bacb186554911751"><span offset-key="86746c75619540a4bacb186554911751:0">Functions are the executable units of code. Functions are usually defined inside a contract, but they can also be defined outside of contracts.</span></span>

1

<span key="762e1ab1ddaf49aba263eb459f734a05"><span offset-key="762e1ab1ddaf49aba263eb459f734a05:0">// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0</span></span>

2

<span key="64cf3e114c5246709929c18d5883bf2a"><span offset-key="64cf3e114c5246709929c18d5883bf2a:0">pragma solidity &gt;=0.7.1 &lt;0.9.0;</span></span>

3

<span key="d8ed62ae73b7402ea3961608d94755ef"><span offset-key="d8ed62ae73b7402ea3961608d94755ef:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

4

<span key="ce82568ef87047139996551a992c6c36"><span offset-key="ce82568ef87047139996551a992c6c36:0">contract SimpleAuction {</span></span>

5

<span key="da0218ac125e4023a5770861312a33c9"><span offset-key="da0218ac125e4023a5770861312a33c9:0"> function bid() public payable { // Function</span></span>

6

<span key="7314e80f59744377babe048bb56e9fcb"><span offset-key="7314e80f59744377babe048bb56e9fcb:0"> // ...</span></span>

7

<span key="d3e655e696604ca98badf9ec578d963f"><span offset-key="d3e655e696604ca98badf9ec578d963f:0"> }</span></span>

<span key="5f8cc924240b43ff853aa6e1a704d3da"><span offset-key="5f8cc924240b43ff853aa6e1a704d3da:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

10

<span key="ad52899beb384df7b0b2e39cc2190fe6"><span offset-key="ad52899beb384df7b0b2e39cc2190fe6:0">// Helper function defined outside of a contract</span></span>

<span key="d3876509a3cb4b39ace6202aaf1a526d"><span offset-key="d3876509a3cb4b39ace6202aaf1a526d:0">function helper(uint x) pure returns (uint) {</span></span>

12

<span key="601b9a98ab9c4cff9b917d6b2ec04229"><span offset-key="601b9a98ab9c4cff9b917d6b2ec04229:0"> return x \* 2;</span></span>

13

Copied!

<span key="117ef0e5ab7e47508707dff5b4692ea9"><span offset-key="117ef0e5ab7e47508707dff5b4692ea9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/control-structures.html#function-calls" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0196a02395d743d9b902c3442e74b3ba" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="51e406d67a9c4152b8822152b0104968"><span data-offset-key="51e406d67a9c4152b8822152b0104968:0">Function Calls</span></span></span></a><span key="d3213c59af5f4978866152f0429188cf"><span offset-key="d3213c59af5f4978866152f0429188cf:0"> can happen internally or externally and have different levels of </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#visibility-and-getters" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="47c4dab1de0a43b4a7e19e0d8e004f3b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="6c16958c94ad48f29f17b8dd5111f062"><span data-offset-key="6c16958c94ad48f29f17b8dd5111f062:0">visibility</span></span></span></a><span key="ec76a6efb130498ba225e7aa176451f0"><span offset-key="ec76a6efb130498ba225e7aa176451f0:0"> towards other contracts. </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#functions" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="95417fdc6dcb47d6b4dfae75f070f696" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="99dcbbfbb2a34b44a6f0ed50513e69f4"><span data-offset-key="99dcbbfbb2a34b44a6f0ed50513e69f4:0">Functions</span></span></span></a><span key="ebfe6d5fcda841b1ab5e2f028aa6edb5"><span offset-key="ebfe6d5fcda841b1ab5e2f028aa6edb5:0"> accept </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#function-parameters-return-variables" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8e1c8c9acbac49178c2c78c39d01edc1" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="ac0788728ff649a69d2d45c98bc8e919"><span data-offset-key="ac0788728ff649a69d2d45c98bc8e919:0">parameters and return variables</span></span></span></a><span key="2ca26aeb5c4e4d74b924d7d77950ef6c"><span offset-key="2ca26aeb5c4e4d74b924d7d77950ef6c:0"> to pass parameters and values between them.</span></span>

## 

<span key="cb83f0fe21e04825a01b2596a062a571"><span offset-key="cb83f0fe21e04825a01b2596a062a571:0">Function Modifiers</span></span>

<span key="90be155b935b49e59d008b4428987623"><span offset-key="90be155b935b49e59d008b4428987623:0">Function modifiers can be used to amend the semantics of functions in a declarative way (see </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#modifiers" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a057243edc004f298e1a90240d6aca69" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="716a551f507b45d5aaa204b6a488c2eb"><span data-offset-key="716a551f507b45d5aaa204b6a488c2eb:0">Function Modifiers</span></span></span></a><span key="e60aff0a28f947d1acd14823696eff6f"><span offset-key="e60aff0a28f947d1acd14823696eff6f:0"> in the contracts section).</span></span>

<span key="5c1b166d1b73496a940c2d757facbd87"><span offset-key="5c1b166d1b73496a940c2d757facbd87:0">Overloading, that is, having the same modifier name with different parameters, is not possible.</span></span>

<span key="d5ebd1b3ec8c41968336afe23d326d07"><span offset-key="d5ebd1b3ec8c41968336afe23d326d07:0">Like functions, modifiers can be </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/contracts.html#modifier-overriding" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1971acf2d0a342a0b882a34a63990030" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="82771b9b5b91404b96b83536a7003702"><span data-offset-key="82771b9b5b91404b96b83536a7003702:0">overridden</span></span></span></a><span key="a119c6995ffc4e83a225e0ea8d48f7c7"><span offset-key="a119c6995ffc4e83a225e0ea8d48f7c7:0">.</span></span>

1

<span key="38acd8895fd74c0faf1fbffc56c23031"><span offset-key="38acd8895fd74c0faf1fbffc56c23031:0">// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0</span></span>

## 

<span key="e3d52d9484c94533927c88ae2f6a117d"><span offset-key="e3d52d9484c94533927c88ae2f6a117d:0">Errors</span></span>

<span key="ede4f05ab32b4c06996a4f71bf3fba61"><span offset-key="ede4f05ab32b4c06996a4f71bf3fba61:0">Errors allow you to define descriptive names and data for failure situations. Errors can be used in </span></span><a href="https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.7/control-structures.html#revert-statement" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="89f43ec6c0cd4cbcbf40a1d426330f0e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-19606_259-19607-237__"><span data-key="50ba501774ed41c8a5e37b9a201b2c1f"><span data-offset-key="50ba501774ed41c8a5e37b9a201b2c1f:0">revert statements</span></span></span></a><span key="4c3f19ad695e4a43866438213bf3732f"><span offset-key="4c3f19ad695e4a43866438213bf3732f:0">. In comparison to string descriptions, errors are much cheaper and allow you to encode additional data. You can use NatSpec to describe the error to the user.</span></span>

1

<span key="0c9cbff4aed34163a110988ffafdb0ad"><span offset-key="0c9cbff4aed34163a110988ffafdb0ad:0">// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0</span></span>
